subject: Re: [junit] OutOfMemoryError
msgSnippet: ... What have you tried to do so far? What happened when you tried executing only half of those tests? http://www.catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html -- J.
messageBody:
Yogesh wrote:

>
> Hi ,
>
> I am getting OutOfMemoryError when I execute the JTest generated
> JUnit test cases. There are around 200 java test files.
>
> Can anyone please help me out in this regard ?

What have you tried to do so far? What happened when you tried executing
only half of those tests?

http://www.catb.org/~esr/faqs/smart-questions.html
